meanings.definition: Not restricted by a specific time limit.
meanings.sent1: The students enjoyed the untimed test, as they could work at their own pace.
meanings.sent2: She prefers untimed activities where she can relax and not worry about deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The untimed puzzle game allowed players to take their time and enjoy the challenge.
meanings.sent4: In the untimed world of art, creativity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The untimed nature walk was a peaceful experience, with no rush to reach the destination.

meanings.definition: Not measured or recorded in relation to time.
meanings.sent1: The untimed experiment did not require precise timing for accurate results.
meanings.sent2: Her untimed breathing exercises helped her relax and focus on the present moment.
meanings.sent3: The untimed conversation flowed naturally without the pressure of time constraints.
meanings.sent4: His untimed movements in dance expressed freedom and emotion without being bound by a beat.
meanings.sent5: The untimed rainfall seemed to cleanse the earth at its own leisurely pace.
